results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = Dyson's rank of the k-th partition of n, with partitions in lexicographic order.
comment: Row n has length A000041(n). The sum of row n is equal to zero.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..26, flattened
maple: else b(n-i, i, t+1); b(n, i+1, t)
mathematica: Table[T[n], {n, 1, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
